name: stickily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that stays attached to any surface it touches: The nuts get stickily coated with a mixture of lemon juice and honey. The bugs cling stickily to the passengers' clothing.
in a way that feels hot and wet: In the training shoes, her toes wriggled stickily. I felt the phone slide stickily from my sweating hand.
More examplesFewer examplesThe chicken satay is perfectly made, soft on the inside and stickily caramelized on the outside.The cake becomes moist and stickily delicious. She could taste the sea air and feel it settle stickily on her skin.
